headline: Coinbase Wants a National Trust Charter. Should You Buy, Sell, or Hold COIN Stock Here?
summary: Coinbase has applied for a national trust company charter from the OCC to expand its crypto business.

headline: Gemini’s IPO Was Meh. But Wall Street Still Likes the Crypto Firm.
summary: Gemini hasn’t done nearly as well after its public debut as rivals Circle, Bullish, and Galaxy. Its underwriters, though, rate the stock a Buy.

raw.headline: Gemini’s IPO Was Meh. But Wall Street Still Likes the Crypto Firm.
raw.summary: Gemini hasn’t done nearly as well after its public debut as rivals Circle, Bullish, and Galaxy. Its underwriters, though, rate the stock a Buy.

headline: Analysts see Gemini Space as next play for investors who missed Coinbase rally
summary: Investing.com -- Analysts at Truist and Mizuho initiated coverage on Gemini Space Station, saying the newly listed cryptocurrency platform offers investors a cheaper way to bet on increasing digital asset adoption and U.S. exchange market share gains.

headline: S&P Dow Jones Launches New S&P Digital Markets 50 Index: A Game-Changer for Crypto Integration?
summary: The boundary between traditional finance (TradFi) and decentralized finance (DeFi) has become even blurrier. On October 7, 2025, S&P Dow Jones Indices announced the launch of the S&P Digital Markets 50 Index, a groundbreaking benchmark designed to track both major cryptocurrencies and crypto-related stocks. The goal? To give investors an ...

headline: Newly Public Crypto Exchange Gemini Gets Lukewarm Reception From KBW
summary: Though liking the long-term prospects for the Winklevoss-led company, KBW placed a market perform rating on the stock, expecting GEMI to remain unprofitable for the time being.

headline: Does Cloudflare’s (NET) Push Into Payments and Global Connectivity Transform Its Long-Term Industry Role?
summary: In recent days, Cloudflare announced major initiatives, including a new payment standard foundation with Coinbase, the launch of a US dollar-backed stablecoin, and a global school connectivity partnership with UNICEF and ITU, as well as tools empowering content control for website owners in the AI era. These multifaceted moves highlight Cloudflare's rapidly evolving ambitions to shape both the future of digital payments and equitable Internet access on a global scale. We'll explore how...

headline: BNY Mellon Trials Blockchain Deposits to Overhaul $2.5T Payments Processing
summary: The effort aims to enable near-instant settlement and potentially reduce transaction costs, with tokenized deposits moving over a blockchain.
